title: how do i get rid of the black popup box that says password required Mozilla firefox   please enter the primary paswor
content:
When i go to a website that requires a password I get a black box that pops up In the box it says Password Required - Moizilla Firefox Please enter the primary password.

How can i make that go away.
creator: phillipesides

title: Add ons and Extensions
content: Why has Add Blocker Ultimate & cookies auto delete & Ant Video Downloader & All Screen Recorder & right click copy and paste ALL stopped working and disappeared from my tool bar immediately after FireFox version 96.0 updated 2 days ago on my windows 10 home laptop? I followed instructions in Mozilla support forums to customize the tool bar settings and reset default settings as instructed and even said "Abbra cadabra" and just like a bad magic trick nothing changed. I have uninstalled them and reinstalled them after rebooting except for AVD which FireFox no longer offers as an Addon extension ??? I read an article written by a volunteer to another person asking for help with these exact problems that started exactly after the version96.0 update , the person asked where to get the older version 95.0 back because all these features work in that version and the volunteer made a complete fool and liar out of himself saying that going back to older versions rarely solved the issues and that the new update had absolutely nothing to do with causing these issues. So either I also am mentally ill and imagining all these issues or that volunteer needs to apologize to the lady and print a retraction. The only thing that changed on my system was from version 95.0 to 96.0 nothing else and I checked with HP support assistant that came factory installed when I bought this laptop from HP direct 8 months ago as well as Microsoft and McAfee my antivirus protection and was given a clean bill of health from all 3. I uninstalled 96.0 and reinstalled 94.0 and can once again right click copy & paste and reinstalled all those apps direct from FireFox Addons browser page and they all show to be on and working but they are not working and I cannot get them back on the tool bar. Is there anyone that can help me solve this issue? I'm a carpenter and have zero tech skills like you people and have asked at least 100 people over the last 3 or 4 years if there is a computer training class or something I can take to try to learn things like you people know and not one person has ever told me how or where I could get the training? So I guess I have 2 questions and please someone help me fix the issues and tell me where I can get the education to hopefully never be a pain in your you know where again? Thank you very much have a wonderful week & blessings to you and all you love Sincerely PS. I am not technologically able to do the troubleshooting process to send the data I have spent 30 minutes trying to understand all this sorry
creator: 1ARICHARDhead

title: How do I paste unformatted text into  Firefox ?
content:
I'm trying to paste text into a text field so that I can list stuff for sale on eBay. When I paste what I've written in my word processor (LibreOffice) the text I paste will not change to the text style I have preset in the text field for my eBay listing. If I were doing this in another word processor I would be able to use a Paste Special command so that the text I'm pasting would automatically change to fit the text style already in use in the document.

Does Firefox not support this ???? Why Not?????
creator: jcs1234

title: prevent downloading the same file twice
content: It would be great if it would warn you that you have already downloaded a file, before adding (n) to the name for multiple versions.
creator: chris451

title: Weird red logo showing in some websites on Firefox
content: Hi there! For the past 3 days, my browser has started to show in some websites a weird red window (kinda reminds me of the youtube logo with inverted colors!). I've already tried 4 antiviruses, 3 antimalware, and I've tried reinstalling the browser cleanly but the issue keeps happening. The other browsers (Chrome, Opera, Edge) are working just fine. The issue happens only on some websites and not at all of them. What should I do now? Thank you!
creator: ligiaflg

title: Firefox update breaks my credit union sign in.
content: I'm putting off the constant notice I get to update firefox because because the last couple of times I've updated Firefox my credit union account is not accessible. The correct screen shows up but it will not progress through sign in screen. It's like the "next" buttons have been deactivated. I have windows 10 on my desktop and I'm currently having this issue on that particular computer.
creator: KaronM

title: Lady Jane
content: Hola, mi problema es que tengo seleccionado el modo claro y al abrir una nueva pestaña se abre en modo oscuro. He intentado hacer lo que indican en una de las preguntas de la guìa; Ir a temas y desactivar automático y seleccionar claro, pero no me aparece en ninguna parte la opción de seleccionar tema!!! Solo hay opcion de habilitar o deshabilitar tema, no está la posibilidad de seleccionar tema claro, osucuro o automàtico!! Necesito ayuda por favor! No pude tomar una captura de pantalla, no me lo permite en la pantall Temas, pero mando una foto para que vean que no aparece la opciòn de elegir el tema. Desde ya muchas gracias!
